trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a solid color.
trans-unit.target: 繪製區域使用純色。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes> class provides a set of commonly used SolidColorBrush objects, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>類別會提供一組常用的 SolidColorBrush 物件，例如<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Yellow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Blue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Brushes>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, the SolidColorBrush class provides several special features: SolidColorBrush objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **可凍結的功能︰**因為它繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>類別 SolidColorBrush 類別提供數個特殊功能︰ SolidColorBrush 物件可以宣告為多個物件之間共用，變成唯讀，以改善效能、 複製，而進行安全執行緒。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關所提供的不同功能<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` ## XAML Values *predefinedBrushName* The name of a brush defined by the class, such as or .
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - - or - ``` # # XAML 值*predefinedBrushName*筆刷或.等類別所定義的名稱

trans-unit.source: *rgb* A three-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *rgb*三位數的十六進位數字，描述這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the second digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the third digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一個數字指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，指定第二位數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>指定值，而第三位數<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `00F`.
*argb* A four-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *argb*四位數的十六進位數字，描述這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first digit specifies the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the second digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next digit specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final digit specifies its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 第一個數字指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，指定第二位數其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，指定下一個數字<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值，且最終的數字會指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `F00F`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`F00F`。

trans-unit.source: *rrggbb* A six-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *rrggbb*六位數的十六進位數字，描述這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前兩個數字指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，後面兩個指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最終的兩個指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `0000FF`.
*aarrggbb* An eight-digit hexadecimal number that describes this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *aarrggbb*描述這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>八位數十六進位數字

trans-unit.source: The first two digits specify the color's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> value, the next two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> value, and the final two specify its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 前兩個數字指定的色彩<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>值，後面兩個指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A>值，後面兩個指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A>值和最終的兩個指定其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A>值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.B%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.G%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.R%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.A%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `FF0000FF`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`FF0000FF`。

trans-unit.source: *scA* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scA* <xref:System.Single><xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A>這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScA%2A></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scR* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scR* <xref:System.Single><xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A>這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScR%2A></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scG* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scG* <xref:System.Single><xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A>這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScG%2A></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *scB* <xref:System.Single> The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A> value of this brush's <xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.
trans-unit.target: *scB* <xref:System.Single><xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A>這個筆刷的<xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush.Color%2A>值</xref:System.Windows.Media.Color.ScB%2A></xref:System.Single>

trans-unit.source: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName> The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: *profileUri* <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]色彩設定檔。</xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> The alpha channel color value.
trans-unit.target: *alphaValue* <xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName> alpha 色板色彩值。</xref:System.Single?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值範圍是介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間。

trans-unit.source: *colorValue* A comma-delimited list of three to eight values that represent the color channels of the color profile.
trans-unit.target: *colorValue*逗點分隔的三個到八個值，表示色頻色彩設定檔的清單。

trans-unit.source: The value range is from 0.0 through 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 值範圍是介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with no color or animations.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>類別沒有色彩或動畫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The color to apply to the fill.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到填滿色彩。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個色彩<xref href="System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需預先定義之色彩的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Colors>

trans-unit.source: For a list of system colors, see the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需系統色彩的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>類別。</xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>
